metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16091 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Symonics libmysofa 0.7 has an out-of-bounds read in directblockRead in hdf/fractalhead.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1
libmysofa0 - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1').
